AI_TURN - Enum constant in enum class View.Pages.GamePanel.State
 
AIPlayer - Class in Model.Players
This class specializes Player to provide the artificial intelligence methods, in particular the method the simulates the human choice factor are : choosing to say Uno (human players can forget so the AI should not be perfect too) choosing to expose someone that forget to say Uno (human players can forget so the AI should not be perfect too) choosing the best card to play choosing the color when performing a Wild In general for each of all the choices a human player performs, there has to be a corresponding AI method.
AIPlayer(String) - Constructor for class Model.Players.AIPlayer
Creates an AIPlayer with the name
